text:
@MKBHD Good review & fair critique. 

In general with interfaces, all input is error. With each software update, the car’s intuition will get better. You will need to press buttons less & less & it will know when to ignore accidental button presses.
@DrPhiltill Minimizing $/ton to the surface of Mars is the fundamental optimization
@pcgamer Great game
@teslaownersSV 🤣🤣
@WholeMarsBlog This will become very important over time

@madan3 We want to do so, but import duties are  the highest in the world by far of any large country! 

Moreover, clean energy vehicles are treated the same as diesel or petrol, which does not seem entirely consistent with the climate goals of India.
@MKBHD Also, the full self-driving interface renders across the whole display & it is incredible. The yoke enables an unobstructed view of the screen.
@AlexSvanArt @Neopork85 Flight tests showed that we could make body flaps narrower & lighter
@WholeMarsBlog @karpathy The feeling is mutual. But I can’t emphasize enough that we work with an amazing team. The credit is theirs.
@SamTwits @MKBHD Tesla Model S Plaid is alien technology
@madan3 But we are hopeful that there will be at least a temporary tariff relief for electric vehicles. That would be much appreciated.
@fredsterrrr @MKBHD No
@TeslaGong @madan3 If Tesla is able to succeed with imported vehicles, then a factory in India is quite likely.
@NASASpaceflight @BocaChicaGal More of a pathfinder test. Actual payload bay door dimensions are still under debate. Volume is ~1000 cubic meters. Roomy …
@newscientist Very impressive! @DeepMind
@flcnhvy @HassanAesthetic @pcgamer Maybe I will. It’s on PC now.
@HassanAesthetic @pcgamer I couldn’t do WoW. Awesome, but too much time required.
@AustinTeslaClub @cleantechnica That’s the goal!
@NASASpaceflight @BocaChicaGal Sure

@Adamklotz_ @PPathole Good idea. They are not easy to move over roads, which is why the factory is close to the launch site, but we will support a museum that wants a prototype if they take care of transport.
